articles.author: Khanyiso Tshwaku
articles.title: Cricket SA CEO Moseki explains Graeme Smith's curious R1.4 million salary jump
articles.description: Cricket South Africa's acting chief executive officer Pholetsi Moseki said Graeme Smith's salary at CSA increased by R1.4 million because of a loss of personal revenue.
articles.content:
• Cricket South Africa's acting chief executive officer Pholetsi Moseki said confirmed that Graeme Smith's salary increase was because of him losing out on personal revenue.

articles.title: T20 World Cup: Afghanistan win toss & bat first v Pakistan - clips, radio & text
articles.description: Follow live text, TMS commentary and in-play clips as Pakistan play Afghanistan in the T20 World Cup at the Dubai International Cricket Stadium.
articles.content:

articles.title: PCB hands Umar Akmal three-year ban from all cricket | ESPNcricinfo.com

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
